nodes.text: Security Hub 62-B was a security station located at the abandoned tram station on Zakuul. In 3630 BBY Kaliyo Djannis and the Alliance Commander disabled the Security Hub in preparation for their assault on the Overwatch.
Security Hub 62-B appears on Zakuul during Chapter 10: Anarchy in Paradise of the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion.
